meanings.def: a piece of cloth or paper used for drying things, especially your body
examples: Help yourself to a clean towel.
a hand/bath towel (= a small/large towel)
a beach towel (= a large towel used for lying on in the sun)
I got out of the pool and wrapped my towel around me.
Pat the area dry with a clean towel.

meanings.def: to admit that you have been defeated and stop trying
examples: We're not going to throw in the towel just because we lost one game.

meanings.def: to throw a towel into the ring as a sign that you admit that you have been defeated
examples: His corner threw in the towel near the end of the tenth round.

idioms.def: to admit that you have been defeated and stop trying

meanings.def: to dry yourself/somebody/something with a towel
